meanings.definition: To move from one place to another
meanings.sent1: Every winter, the birds migrates to warmer regions.
meanings.sent2: The butterflies migrates south for the colder months.
meanings.sent3: The family of ducks decided to migrates to a new pond for a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: As the seasons change, the sun migrates across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The herds of wildebeest migrates in search of fresh grazing lands.

meanings.sent1: The furniture migrates around the room whenever the kids play.
meanings.sent2: The sand dunes slowly migrates over time due to the wind.
meanings.sent3: The misplaced sock always seems to migrates to the back of the drawer.
meanings.sent4: The shadows migrates as the sun sets behind the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The magnetic north migrates slightly each year.

meanings.definition: To travel regularly to a different place for work or lifestyle reasons
meanings.sent1: Many people migrates to the city for better job opportunities.
meanings.sent2: The nomadic tribe migrates with their livestock to find fresh pastures.
meanings.sent3: The retired couple migrates to a warmer climate during the winter months.
meanings.sent4: The salesperson migrates between different regions to meet clients.
meanings.sent5: The monarch butterflies migrates annually to Mexico for the winter.
